markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Supernatural Charm](/Feats.aspx?ID=4570) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aiuvarin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=515" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

The elven magic in your blood manifests as a force you can use to become more appealing or alluring. You can cast 1st-rank [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) as an arcane [innate spell](/Rules.aspx?ID=279) once per day.
name: Supernatural Charm
